name: StudentsDB
description: Frontend driven restful application with Node, Express, Bootstrap and MongoDB

scripts.postinstall: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js app/views/assets/js/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css app/views/assets/css/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js app/views/assets/js/

author: LeoDvg
